sentences.en: Confrontation between the two sides ensued for 3 hours as a result, eventually with the Vietnamese Navy retreating due to inclement weather.
sentences.cn: 双方的对抗持续了3小时，最终越南海军由于险恶的天气而撤退。

sentences.en: Granted Power: Inclement weather has less of an effect on you.
sentences.cn: 神授力量: 恶劣天气对你影响减小.

sentences.en: Increased concern has been reported in Tajikistan due to inclement weather on the cotton crop.
sentences.cn: 塔吉克斯坦的棉花作物由于恶劣的天气被广泛关注.

sentences.en: Loggers also deal with severe environmental conditions such as inclement weather and severe heat cold.
sentences.cn: 伐木者还需要在严酷的环境条件下工作,例如险恶的天气,严寒和酷暑.

sentences.en: The inclement weather brought forth a host of diseases.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的天气引起了种种疾病.

sentences.en: The inclement weather influenced our decision to leave there a day earlier.
sentences.cn: 严酷的天气影响了我们提前一天离开的决定.

sentences.en: The vagaries of inclement weather conditions are avoided to a certain extent.
sentences.cn: 可以在一定程度上避免变化莫测的恶劣气候影响.

sentences.en: There is no charge, it is safe, and it is protected from inclement weather above.
sentences.cn: 这里无须费用, 安全, 并且可以避免上面严寒的天气.

sentences.en: They kept on going, even through the inclement weather.
sentences.cn: 即使天气恶劣,他们还是执意要去.

sentences.en: This space wraps around the southern side of the house, and is covered by an overhanging roof. A fireplace allows residents to enjoy the outdoors, even in inclement weather.
sentences.cn: 这部分空间包裹着建筑的南面，被悬挑屋顶覆盖。即使在恶劣的天气情况下，壁炉的存在使居民可以更享受户外空间。

words.tran_cn: 严酷，气候严酷；天气险恶

trans.tran_cn: <正>（天气）恶劣的（指寒冷的、潮湿的等）
trans.tran_en: inclement weather is unpleasantly cold, wet etc
